Title: Chapter Six: Star of the Morning
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Laura Marks
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Hannah Kasulka, Brianne Howey
Plot: The Rance family is engulfed in a storm of publicity, while Marcus' search for Casey leads him into the terrifying underbelly of the city.
